object.name: resourcefolder
object.property:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf8'?> <model xmlns:easyform="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/easyform" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="mhcs_filetype" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>File Type</title> <source>collective.ambidexterity.vocabulary</source></field>
<field name="audience" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Audience</title> </field> <field name="organisation" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Organisation</title> </field> <field name="organisation_url" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Organisation URL</title> </field> <field name="last_reviewed_date" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Last Reviewed Date</title> </field> </schema> </model>
